de.hpi.javaide.breakout.screens.Screen

    de.hpi.javaide.breakout.screens  

    • Uses of Screen in de.hpi.javaide.breakout.screens

      Classes in de.hpi.javaide.breakout.screens that implement Screen 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EndScreen
      Diese Klasse repraesentiert den EndScreen, der bei Spielende angezeigt wird.
      class  GameScreen
      Diese Klasse repraesentiert die Anzeige des Spielbildschirms.
      class  StartScreen
      Diese Klasse repraesentiert den StartScreen, der bei Programmstart angezeigt wird.

      Methods in de.hpi.javaide.breakout.screens that return Screen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Screen ScreenManager.getCurrentScreen() 
      static Screen StartScreen.getInstance(Game game)
      StartScreen implements a "Lazy Instantiation" of the Singleton Design Patterns (Gang of Four) This approach is not "Thread safe", but is sufficient for our current needs.
      static Screen GameScreen.getInstance(Game game)
      GameScreen implements a "Lazy Instantiation" of the Singleton Design Patterns (Gang of Four) This approach is not "Thread safe", but is sufficient for our current needs.
      static Screen EndScreen.getInstance(Game game)
      EndScreen implements a "Lazy Instantiation" of the Singleton Design Patterns (Gang of Four) This approach is not "Thread safe", but is sufficient for our current needs.
